Type ConfigurationHelper

Namespace Fake

Contains functions which allow to read and write config files.

Methods

  • readConfig
  • updateAppSetting
  • updateConfig
  • updateConfigSetting
  • updateConnectionString
  • writeConfig

Public static methods

XmlDocument readConfig(string fileName)

Reads a config file into an XmlDocument. ## Parameters - `fileName` - The file name of the config file.

void updateAppSetting(string key, string value, string fileName)

Reads a config file from the given file name, replaces the app setting value and writes it back. ## Parameters - `key` - The AppSettings attribute key name for which the value should be replaced. - `value` - The new AppSettings attribute value. - `fileName` - The file name of the config file.

XmlDocument updateConfig(string xpath, string attribute, string value, XmlDocument config)

Reads a config file from the given file name, replaces an attribute using the given xPath and writes it back. ## Parameters - `xpath` - An XPath term which can be used to replace the attribute. - `attribute` - The attribute name for which the value should be replaced. - `value` - The new attribute value. - `config` - The XElement representing the config.

void updateConfigSetting(string fileName, string xpath, string attribute, string value)

Reads a config file from the given file name, replaces an attribute using the given xPath and writes it back. ## Parameters - `fileName` - The file name of the config file. - `xpath` - An XPath term which can be used to replace the attribute. - `attribute` - The attribute name for which the value should be replaced. - `value` - The new attribute value.

void updateConnectionString(string connectionStringKey, string value, string fileName)

Reads a config file from the given file name, replaces the connection string value and writes it back. ## Parameters - `connectionStringKey` - The connection string key name for which the value should be replaced. - `value` - The new connection string value. - `fileName` - The file name of the config file.

void writeConfig(string fileName, XmlDocument config)

Writes an XmlDocument to a config file. ## Parameters - `fileName` - The file name of the config file. - `config` - The XElement representing the config.
